features: HANDHELD BRUSH AND DUSTPAN SET: Includes a handheld angled brush and coordinating dustpan for an all-in-one sweeping solution
POINTED TIP BRUSH: Pointed design with rubber bumpers easily reaches into corners, cracks, and other hard-to-reach areas while protecting walls from scuffs
INNOVATIVE DUSTPAN: Designed with a built-in comb for cleaning dust off the brush, and the soft rubber lip lies flat against the floor to maximize pick up
SOFT-GRIP ERGONOMIC HANDLE: Soft-grip handled brush provides comfort and ergonomic use, and it fits securely into the dustpan for convenience
EFFICIENT MEDIUM SIZE: Measures 14" x 9" x 4" total for efficient storage in cabinets, drawers, and closets when not in use
body.description: Keep your home clean and tidy with the Casabella Wayclean Handheld Angled Brush and Dustpan Set. This cleaning set includes an angled brush and coordinating dustpan for an all-in-one sweeping solution. The brush features a pointed tip designed to easily reach into corners, cracks, and other hard-to-reach areas that would be difficult to clean with a regular broom, while the rubber bumpers along the sides of the brush prevent it from scuffing or scratching the wall. The dustpan is designed with a built-in comb for cleaning dust off the brush, and the soft rubber lip lies flat against the floor to maximize pick up. The soft-grip handled brush provides comfort and ergonomic use, and it fits securely into the dustpan for convenience. This medium-sized hand broom set measures 14" x 9" x 4" total for efficient storage in cabinets, drawers, and closets when not in use. Casabella was created with the novel idea that housewares and cleaning products could be great looking, fun and functional all at the same time. With focus on product and graphic design we strive to deliver products that are attractive, intuitive and supremely functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The size is hard to understand from Amazon. Of dustpans I’ve seen in my life, this one is almost exactly in the middle size-wise, which imo is perfect. Fwiw it probably a bit too small to use comfortably with a standard floor broom, but I have broom pans for that, dustpan is supplemental and I don’t want it to be large.Quality & design is excellent. They clearly put some thought into how the product is used.The Pan: silicone ‘lip’ at the leading edge is nice and pliable so dirt does not get underneath when sweeping on a slightly non-flat surface. Quality feels fine. Its a plastic injection molded polypropylene piece with a matte finish on the outside, glossy on the inside. It also has little nubs on the bottom of the back so it won’t grind dirt and sand into my wood floor while using it.The brush: feels great in hand, great weight to it, over-molded grip feels good and is secure. Unsure what it is made out of, I think all the proof marks are under the over-mold or among the bristles. Feels different than the pan, and the mold itself shows a bit more wear vs. the Pan’s mold. Nothing I would call a defect and overall its up there with the best in the category. The handle isn’t bulbous or round like Oxo tends to do for handles so if you have really bad arthritis it might not be ideal for you. The bristles are a little stiff because its new so it can fling dirt if you’re not careful. I think this will fix itself over time as most brooms do.I typically stick to Oxo for products like this but I don’t like their dustpan design. This Casabella branded model could easily be Oxo branded and I wouldn’t question it (other than lacking the characteristic Oxo-bulbous handle + Oxo colorway).Happy with it, best dustpan of the 5 or so I’ve owned to-date. Thank you for attending my ted talk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Youll never find a better one
reviews.reviewText: I really did my homework researching this set, after disappointment with other dustpan/brush sets. The features make cleaning up so much easier and it all fits together beautifully and stores so easily. Got one for my daughter too, and their family loves it. The angled corner aspect is especially nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Use for multiple floors in my homeespecially kitchen. (HUSBAND IS A SLOPPY COOK). Nice for quick sweep rather than digging out dust mop, broom or mom. Quality excellent. May buy more and give to daughters in law!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love how this gets into corners
reviews.reviewText: No more knocking at my baseboards - smoothly dusts out corners. The rubber could be improved. Right now I have to angle the pan 45 degrees for the dust not to get underneath. But for a hand sweeper it's good enough. The teeth are really good, helps keep the brush clean. Like my mop I wash this and with a bit of a swing it eventually dries pretty quickly. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly, best quality dustpan & hand brush in my life so far
reviews.reviewText: There's something about the shape as well as the "rubberized" edges that make scooping up random spills, crumbs, et al. infinitely easier and more comfortable, as well as quicker and gathering more faster than any other dustpan we've had before. Plus this one is available in a few cool combos of colors (green or orange lining). Really happy with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pan and sweeper i have come across
reviews.reviewText: Brush is tapered at the end to get into small places and corners. Gets up all the debris easily and love the little comb at the back to clean the brush of lint that has stuck to it. Usually I have to pick it off with my hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Brush
reviews.reviewText: Oh boy! This brush and dustpan picks everything up in one swipe. Didn't know I was buying cheap cruddy ones that never really worked great, and required extra work. This set makes my life easier. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best thing about this dustpan is the rubber front edge is very pliable, so you can bend the pan up a bit and it catches everything. Most others are like a straight line of hard metal. I have 2 of these and am ordering a 3rd for around the litterbox.
Esperaba algo menos. Buenos materiales, práctica, fácil de guardar, y fácil de usar.
I have no dislikes with this product, it’s very comfortable and sweeps up every bit of dust very efficiently. Very very happy with this product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality and nice straight edge.
Resistente, bonito, exactamente como se describe y súper útil.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality, happy with my purchase
reviews.reviewText: Really clean and sleek looking. Has grooved edges to pull off the stuff that sticks to the brush. Very good quality product.
